name: elysian
description: Elysian is a self-hosted productivity and dashboard app combining notes, tasks, and widgets into a single customizable home page. It is aimed at individuals who want a personal command center for daily planning.
features: Unified Dashboard: Notes, tasks, and widgets in one place. Personal command center.
Customizable Layout: Arrange your homepage exactly how you want. Total flexibility.
Daily Planning: Organize your day from a single interface. Streamlined productivity.
Widget Support: Add custom information blocks and tools. Extensible dashboard.
Personal Homepage: Your own customized start page. Tailored to your needs.
Self-Hosted: Run your productivity hub privately. Complete control and privacy.
